arts.ttl: Arsenal vying with Al Hilal to sign La Liga starlet
arts.sum: The 2024-25 season could end up being the last for Alberto Moleiro in La Liga. The 21-year-old has started to deliver on his potential over the last 12 months, and because of this, notable clubs are starting to register their interest in his services. Al Hilal have been linked with a move for Moleiro in […] The post Arsenal vying with Al Hilal to sign La Liga starlet appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: Revealed: FIFA confirm pots for 2025 Club World Cup draw - with Chelsea, Man City and Real Madrid all set to feature in the United States tournament
arts.sum: The 2025 Club World Cup will be contested by 32 clubs from the six continental confederations and will be the first edition in this format to take place in the United States.

arts.ttl: Former Chelsea star set to be BANISHED from Saudi club's squad to make room for Neymar
arts.sum: Amid a raft of European stars joining the emerging division in the wake of Cristiano Ronaldo's landmark arrival, Neymar's was perhaps the name that stuck out most after leaving PSG in 2023.
